sentences.en: ‘I’m sorry,’ she said quietly.
sentences.cn: “对不起。”她轻声说道。

sentences.en: "This is goodbye, isn't it?" she said quietly.
sentences.cn: “这就算是告别了，是吗？”她轻轻地说。

sentences.en: A lady always sits quietly with her hands in her lap.
sentences.cn: 淑女端坐时总是双手放在膝上，不发一言。

sentences.en: a quietly-spoken man (= one who always speaks quietly )
sentences.cn: 说话轻柔的男人

sentences.en: Amy stood quietly in the doorway watching him.
sentences.cn: 埃米一言不发地站在门口看着他。

sentences.en: Freddy speaks very quietly and pads around in soft velvet slippers.
sentences.cn: 弗蕾迪说话轻声细气，穿着柔软的天鹅绒拖鞋蹑手蹑脚地四处走动。

sentences.en: He quietly intoned several prayers.
sentences.cn: 他肃穆地轻声念了几句祈祷词。

sentences.en: He quietly slipped away and left me to my tears.
sentences.cn: 他悄悄溜走了，独剩我一人落泪。

sentences.en: Herbert sat quietly through the telling of this saga.
sentences.cn: 在聆听这个长篇传奇故事时，赫伯特自始至终安静地坐着。

sentences.en: His most prized time, though, will be spent quietly on his farm.
sentences.cn: 不过，他最宝贵的时光将在自己的农场里平静地度过。

sentences.en: I slipped away quietly.
sentences.cn: 我不声不响地溜走了。

sentences.en: Kelly swore quietly, looking at the deep cut on his left hand.
sentences.cn: 凯利看着自己左手上深深的伤口，嘴里暗骂了一句。

sentences.en: Nigel Deering, the publisher, is quietly confident about the magazine's chances.
sentences.cn: 出版商奈杰尔·迪林心中对这份杂志的成功很有把握。

sentences.en: Now are you gonna come quietly, or do I have to use force?
sentences.cn: 你是乖乖地过来，还是非要我动武才行？

sentences.en: Others were quietly tuning up their instruments.
sentences.cn: 其他人正静静地为他们的乐器调音。

sentences.en: Quietly Mark poured and served drinks for all of them.
sentences.cn: 马克一声不响地给他们每人倒好饮料并端上来。

sentences.en: Rosa shut the door quietly.
sentences.cn: 罗莎悄悄关上门。

sentences.en: She's not going to go quietly.
sentences.cn: 她不会乖乖离开的。

sentences.en: Speculation is growing that Grogan will be replaced at the end of the season, and he is unlikely to go quietly.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的人猜测格罗根将在本赛季结束时被替换掉，而他是不会善罢甘休的。

sentences.en: The raft bobbed along more quietly.
sentences.cn: 小木筏更加平静地漂浮向前。

words.tran_cn: 安静的；安定的；不动的；温顺的

trans.tran_cn: 平静地，静止地，轻声地，在暗中
